name: Gateway of India
description: An iconic archway built in 1924 to commemorate the visit of King George V and Queen Mary to India. It overlooks the Arabian Sea and is a popular tourist destination.
comments: Visit early in the morning to avoid crowds and enjoy the scenic views. Boat rides are available from this location, taking you to Elephanta Island.

name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site and an excellent example of Victorian Gothic architecture in India, this railway terminus is one of the busiest railway stations in the country.
comments: Take a guided tour to learn about its history and architecture. The area around the terminus is bustling with activity, so be sure to take some time to explore.

name: Elephanta Caves
description: A network of sculpted caves located on Elephanta Island, these caves are famous for their rock-cut sculptures depicting Hindu deities.
comments: The best time to visit is during the cooler months from November to February. Take a ferry from the Gateway of India for a scenic journey to the island.

name: Kala Ghoda Arts Precinct
description: A vibrant area known for its rich cultural heritage, art galleries, museums, and boutiques. It's a hub for artists and art lovers.
comments: Plan your visit around the Kala Ghoda Arts Festival held annually in February, showcasing local art, dance, and music.

name: Mumbai Street Food
description: Mumbai is famous for its street food, featuring a mix of flavors and cuisines. Must-try items include Vada Pav, Pani Puri, and Pav Bhaji.
comments: Visit local street food stalls in Juhu Chowpatty or CST area. It's best to eat where the locals do and ensure the food stall appears busy, reflecting freshness.

name: Crawford Market
description: A bustling market known for fresh produce, spices, and household goods. The market is famous for its architecture and vibrant atmosphere.
comments: Take your time exploring the various stalls, and don't miss the opportunity to sample fresh fruits and snacks available throughout the market.
